solution_line_template: The number of beads used for the necklaces is {total_necklaces} * {beads_per_necklace} = <<{total_necklaces}*{beads_per_necklace}={beads_necklaces}>>{beads_necklaces} beads
The number of beads used for the bracelets is {bracelets_wednesday} * {beads_per_bracelet} = <<{bracelets_wednesday}*{beads_per_bracelet}={beads_bracelets}>>{beads_bracelets} beads
The number of beads used for the earrings is {earrings_wednesday} * {beads_per_earring} = <<{earrings_wednesday}*{beads_per_earring}={beads_earrings}>>{beads_earrings} beads
The total number of beads used is {beads_necklaces} + {beads_bracelets} + {beads_earrings} = <<{beads_necklaces}+{beads_bracelets}+{beads_earrings}={total_beads}>>{total_beads} beads
